import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'votingPage'; lastName:string =""; search:boolean=true; ranges:any[] = [ {init:'ABALOS ROSSO',end: 'CAMACHO HUANCA', tableNum:4,classRoom:507}, {init:'CAMACHO KOYO',end: 'CUENCA FELIPE', tableNum:5,classRoom:508}, {init:'CUENTAS AGUILAR',end: 'HUANCA LUMPE', tableNum:6,classRoom:509}, {init:'HUANCA MAMANI',end: 'MENDOZA CHOQUE', tableNum:7,classRoom:511}, {init:'MENDOZA COLQUE',end: 'QUISPE GUZMAN', tableNum:8,classRoom:512}, {init:'QUISPE HUANCA',end: 'TARQUI VARGAS', tableNum:9,classRoom:513}, {init:'TEJERINA CHACA',end: 'ZURITA VEIZAGA', tableNum:10,classRoom:514}] seeClassRoom(){ if(this.lastName.trim()=="")return alert("Ingresa tu apellido") this.search = false; } clean(){ this.search = true; } }
